Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(self:GetParent().panels[index].Back, self:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then self:GetParent().panels[index].Submit(self:GetParent().panels[index])
end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(self:GetParent().panels[index].Reset, self:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(self:GetParent().panels[index].Start, self:GetParent().panels[index]) end end
if ( self.scroll.thumb:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then self.panel.ScrollOnUpdate(self.panel, 1); end self:Lower();
if ( self.scroll:GetParent().Click ) then self.scroll:GetParent().Click(self.scroll:GetParent(), self.element, self) end PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(self:GetParent().panels[index].Back, self:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(self:GetParent().panels[index].Skip, self:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then self:GetParent().panels[index].Submit(self:GetParent().panels[index])
end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(self:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(self:GetParent().panels[index].Reset, self:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

FontString.name: $parentDescription
